Name: treatment of sewage sludge, 97% water, WWT-SLF, waste glass, landfarming | sewage sludge, 97% water, WWT-SLF, waste glass | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste
Description: Landfarming is the process of spreading a substrate on agricultural soil. Sewage sludge is generated in the leachate treatment generated from sanitary landfilling of 'waste glass'. Spreading of liquid sewage sludge (97w% water content) on agricultural fields with mobile vacuum tanker.
